entry.title: Boreas; If I'm Kindling For A Little While, At Least I'd Feel Of Use
entry.summary:
Author: WitchAndSeer

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,766Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 1,967

Summary: Stiles was tired, tired in the way that forest fires never really looked like they were ever going to end.His need to fix things, all the things he'd messed up, was too heavy. He would do anything if it meant he could fix it all.In the end he would feel that warmth again. With Peter by his side and a budding something between Derek and himself, maybe the Hales, alive and well, could help fix him too.

entry.title: Yours In This Life And The Next
entry.summary:
Author: Jadezdominion

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 637Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Derek is nearly done getting his PhD in Archeology. His dissertation had been formally accepted, and he was now on his final expedition before presenting himself before the panel of experts to defend it.Although he was one step closer to achieving his academic dreams, it felt like he was fifty million steps away from his beloved, Stiles.So he picked up pen and paper, the only thing available in the jungle he was currently in, and let his feelings pour out in written form.

entry.title: We Ain’t Angry At You, Love. You’re The Greatest Thing We’ve Lost.
entry.summary:
Author: Christell_Nobody

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,832Chapters: 10/13Kudos: 705

Summary: Inspired By; You’re Gonna Gar Far By Noah Kahan & Brandi CarlileSince Void, so much has happened. His dad is still just as neglectful, and now all his friends just stopped all contact. Derek and Peter left. If it wasn’t for Melissa and Jordan he’d be drowning and probably dead. After his 16th birthday he makes a decision, Melissa and Jordan help him and are supportive, a bit heartbroken but understanding.Noah doesn’t even care what he’s signing. Doesn’t care he signed his parental rights away, but was he ever a parent?With promises to keep contact, he is off.“So pack up your car, put a hand on your heart.”

entry.title: Tethers
entry.summary:
Author: Lunarflare14

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,305Chapters: 20/20Kudos: 1,006

Summary: Stiles never thought fairies would be his down fall. Now Stiles is kind of forced to “haunt” his friends and Derek is the only one who refuses to let them give up on him. It would be endearing if it wasn’t so sad.It doesn’t help that people keep mysteriously drowning either. Turns out Stiles can actually feel more useless.“Okay, Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come, I get it! Weird pack dynamics actually work without me. Can I go home?”

entry.summary:
Author: Lir_The_Witch

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,721Chapters: 12/12Kudos: 849

Summary: guys, this is bad, wait for the re-write pleaseStiles was born with magic, it slowly faded away after his mothers death and is rediscovering what he can do while his life goes into chaos. Stiles was born from magic and bravery, it's being tested and pulled at as a new problem comes into town. AND to top that off Stiles has to try and get Derek to bond with him so he can become pack Emissary, the trusted adviser of the Alpha known for brooding, grunting and climbing through his window at ungodly hours of the night.

entry.title: 1977: A Spark on the Pond Shore
entry.summary:
Author: eclipselotus

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,584Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Stiles Stilinski, a mischievous eight-year-old, harbored a secret. Only his mother knew about the magical hoodie, and her dire warnings were clear: "Don't tell anyone, and don't play with it too much, my little Mischief. Otherwise, trouble will find you."With a simple tug, the magical hoodie transforms Stiles into a sixteen-year-old boy, granting him the perfect cover: Lucas Wilczek. All he wants is to spend time with his babysitter, Derek Hale, even if it means stealing him from Paige Krasikeva.

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,892Chapters: 12/19Kudos: 429

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.” Stiles stares at him. “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?” “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away. Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: At The End, A New Beginning
entry.summary:
Author: JasonRazCalZevr

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,725Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 2

Summary: He saw flashes, first it was his own life that he burned through, then it was the shadow that killed the nemeton. Then it was someplace else, across an ocean where the people were dark skinned and wearing flowing white linen robes. Before that he burned a shadow out of the heart of a volcano, and before that he burned it from the heart of a man. Back and back and back he went until he existed in a lightless void, and there was a burning bundle of chaos that once went wrong, and it turned to ash at the last moment before light exploded around him and there was nothing but fire and distant stars.

entry.title: Shattered and Bound
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,799Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 323

Summary: After losing Derek and his father to a feral Scott in the aftermath of the Nogitsune, a shattered Stiles kills his former best friend and is left drowning in guilt and grief.Unable to live in a world where everyone he loves is gone, he casts a one way time travel spell meant to rewrite it all - only to wake up years earlier than expected, in a peaceful dimension where he never existed and the Hales are still alive.Haunted by trauma and drawn to a younger, unbroken Derek, Stiles must navigate healing, fate, and love in a world that was never meant to be his.

entry.title: Stiles' Treasures
entry.summary:
Author: Ann_shawol24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,967Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 55

Summary: Allison is about to have her child, but her birth brings more complications than expected. The baby wants the pack together and won't be born until she has it.Desperate, Scott decides to search for the person who was once his best friend, Stiles Stilinski, who one day just left town.Can they convince him to come back?Enter and find out.Originally published on Wattpad, April 2020 - Completed May 2020This story is just a translation of the original Spanish version on Wattpad; it's been in the works for a while.Both the translation and the original work are my own.

entry.title: The Hunt for the Argent Codex
entry.summary:
Author: Ticket_to_Insanity

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,400Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 17

Summary: Hunters across the globe are seeking the Argent Codex - a mythical book said to hold spells, maps, and rituals that can tip the supernatural balance. After a mysterious group attacks Scott and steals a page from Deaton's collection, Stiles is forced to team up with Derek, who recently returned to Beacon Hills tracking the same cult.The two set off on a road trip across old supernatural sites to stop the cult from reassembling the Codex. Between magical threats, near-death experiences, and cramped motel rooms, their antagonism starts giving way to something hotter... and far more dangerous.
